channel.title: It on Cerebral Mastication: Something to Chew On
channel.description: Recent content in It on Cerebral Mastication: Something to Chew On

item.title: Using Amazon EC2 to Thwart Crappy Internal IT Services
item.description: The alternative title of this blog post is “How to get your sorry ass fired by violating your internal IT policies.” So keep that in mind as you read this. I say lots of silly crap. Twitter allows me the pleasure of sharing this blather with the world. I was a little surprised that of all the things I have said over the last few months the above Tweet received the most discussion.
